function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Large scientific literature on COVID-19 and public health intervention.","Impact":"Lack of architectural perspective on improving IAQ and addressing airborne transmission risks.","Mitigation":"Incorporate building design strategies and air quality challenges into post-pandemic architecture.","Technologies":"Holistic engineering solutions for IAQ enhancement.","People":"Architects, public health researchers, building occupants.","Owner":"Architects, public health researchers, building designers."},{"Description":"Air pollution increasing susceptibility to SARS-CoV-2 infection.","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne transmission of diseases, including COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Implement ventilation-related interventions and reduce accumulation of indoor air pollutants.","Technologies":"Ventilation engineering solutions, air purification technologies.","People":"Building occupants, public health professionals.","Owner":"Building designers, public health professionals."},{"Description":"Indoor environment quality mediating the impact of the built environment on residents' health.","Impact":"Potential for accumulation of indoor air pollutants contributing to sick building syndrome.","Mitigation":"Focus on improving IAQ, thermal comfort, and visual and acoustic conditions in buildings.","Technologies":"Holistic engineering solutions for IAQ, indoor air quality monitoring technologies.","People":"Architects, public health researchers, building occupants.","Owner":"Architects, public health researchers, building designers."}]}
